data.actual_result: There is the option to delete the message
data.expected_result: There shouldn't be the option to delete the message like on desktop clients
data.short_description: You get the option to delete system messages saying that the name of a group DM was changed
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a group DM or create one by clicking the Create Group DM icon located in the top right corner of your display - Change the name of the group DM and press hold on message saying it was changed (it may take a few tries) - Notice that you get the option to delete it, but pressing it does nothing
